title: A Place To Call Home!
posting_body: ['Welcome To Sevilla', 'Our community offers large, open f2 bedroom foorplans including some townhomes.', 'In our homes you will find features such as: wood-like plank style flooring, full size washer/dryer connections, fireplaces and lots of closet space.', 'These apartments were made with you in mind!', 'Ample parking, a refreshing pool (open seasonally), and tons of walking trails nearby are just some of the things you have to look forward to while making Sevilla your home.', 'Make your appointment today and come see your new home!', 'Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., TX - License # 9003183', '-Laundry Facility', '-Pool', '-W/D Hookup', '-Extra Storage', '-Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Ceiling Fan', '-Close to Restaurants', '-Spanish Speaking Staff', '-Business Center', '-Carpeting', '-Handrails', '-On-Site Maintenance', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
